title: Zyler
author: Zyler
content: A Taproot riddle for Detectives … Born in a libertarian womb,I will change the world soon,Built on a foundation of granite,My people are from another planet,Two ledgers are twice the fun,BTC is the father; I am the son,Yet I am neither he nor she,I despise having to pay a fee,I am the sh*tcoins death knell,But rather than tell or sell,Give me proof of work for a clue,Find Block 709 632… who am I?
